descriptionsFooter.variant2: rating displays Digital Democracy users opinion

cookies.descriptionCookies: This web-site uses cookie for analytics, personalization and advertising. Continuing to view it you agree with the use of cookie.

home.descriptionHome: Dear friend! Development of democracy is impossible without restraint and balancer system,that prevents concentration of overall power in one hands and provides for equal division of the same between state power branches. With development of communication means the mass media have added to the system, which can influence public opinion, however, without citizen feedback. The Internet had introduced interactive to power and people dialogue. It is only required to formalize and structure these relationships and the society will be ready to enter the next stage of the political regime - «Digital democracy». Welcome!

resetPassword.messageCheckEmail: Check your email, password recovery instructions have been sent there

step3.descriptionConfirmEmail: Email was sent to you to confirm the registration
step3.descriptionConfirmPhone: Code was sent to your phone number to confirm the registration
step3.codeWithSeconds: You will get a new code in

step5.descriptionStep5: Dear friend! Democracy is ''the power of society''; the society is the source of power. But it is as well a responsibility to exercise this right, to make own choice, to vote for those whom the society endows with this power. The responsibility to express own position so as to change living for us and our children in our country for good. The digital era provides new opportunities. Our platform allows users to form a rating of politicians through the assessment of their actions, so that on this basis they could further make an comprehensive choice. An important part of the rating is its fairness. Therefore, we will struggle in all possible ways the attempts to affect the rating. This, unfortunately, can affect respectable users as well. We accept everyone, however if an account is suspected of fraudulent activity, we will require verification. In case the verification fails, all ratings and account actions will be deleted. Hope for your understanding. Welcome to ''Digital Democracy''!
